product_name: Sony POV Action Cam + GPS and Live View Remote Bundle
long_description: The Sony POV Action Cam + GPS and Live View Remote Bundle captures and shares all your fast-action experiences with high-quality optics, Wi-Fi connectivity and GPS that tracks your location and speed. Bundle includes a POV Action Cam, Live View remote, waterproof case, rechargeable battery pack, microUSB cable, adhesive mount, tripod adapter and operating guide. Included Live View remote with its own screen and comfortable wrist strap lets you control the Action Cam remotely and watch live-view footage. Shoot pro-quality video in XAVC-S 60p (50 Mbps). Advanced image stabilization adjusts to vibration. Exmor R(R) CMOS sensor for superb low-light shooting. Ultra-wide 170deg pro-quality Carl Zeiss(R) Vario-Tessar(R) lens. Capture high-quality 13.5MP still images in photo mode. Plot location and display telemetry with built-in GPS. Built-In stereo mic for quality sound recording. Memory Stick Micro(TM) and Micro SD/SDHC compatible. HDMI(R) output for easy file transfer. The Sony POV Action Cam + GPS features a splash-proof body with tripod mount.
